title: Margaret's Secret Message
description: In the throes of the Revolutionary War, a young girl must call upon her courage to help the Patriots' cause. Margaret's Secret Message is a suspense-filled story that engages readers through historical fiction and detailed illustrations. The book can also be used to teach students how to analyze characters as well as identify and use closed-compound words.
